code: export async function convertBlobToDataURLArray(blobs){const promises=blobs.map(blob=>new Promise((resolve,reject)=>{const reader=new FileReader();reader.onload=()=>resolve(reader.result);reader.onerror=reject;reader.readAsDataURL(blob);}));return Promise.all(promises);}export function blobToDataURL(blob){return new Promise((resolve,reject)=>{const reader=new FileReader();reader.onerror=reject;reader.onload=()=>resolve(reader.result);reader.readAsDataURL(blob);});}
